frame.name: Attempt_obtain_mineral_scenario
frame.definition: <def-root>An Agent attempts to obtain a non-renewable resource, often solid minerals or metals, but also oil, water, and other valuable substances.</def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> makes an attempt to obtain minerals.</def-root>

FE.name: Outcome
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Outcome</fen> is the failure or success of an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> action performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> which they hope will let them obtain the Mineral.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The place where an attempt is made.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The time period over which the attempts take place.</def-root>

FE.name: Mineral
FE.definition: <def-root>The valuable resource which the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to acquire.</def-root>
